full_summary:
**Notice of Proposed Procurement: RFP400**

* **Title**: RFP400: Stream 3A, Financial Instruments Valuation
* **Reference Number**: cb-8805-70398092
* **Publication Date**: September 7, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 22, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 16, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: February 29, 2024
* **Trade Agreements**: CFTA, CCFTA, CUFTA, CFTA, CPTPP, CETA, WTO-GPA

**Request for Proposal Overview**

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG) is seeking a contractor to provide financial instruments valuation services for the annual audit of Export Development Canada (EDC) consolidated financial statements. The contractor will assist the audit team in valuing the allowance for losses on non-credit impaired loans and loan guarantees for the year ending December 31, 2023, with an option to extend for the years ending 2024 and 2025.

**Applicable Trade Agreements**

This requirement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* CFTA (Canadian Free Trade Agreement)
* CCFTA (Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement)
* CUFTA (Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement)
* CFTA (Canadian Free Trade Agreement)
* CPTPP (Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership)
* CETA (Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement)
* WTO-GPA (World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement)

**Eligibility Criteria**

To be eligible, suppliers must be holders of the Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement (SA) under the SA369 series, specifically Stream 3A – Financial Instruments Valuation. The following suppliers have been invited to submit a bid:

* BDO Canada LLP
* Deloitte LLP
* KPMG LLP
* PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP

**Contract Parameters**

* The proposed contract period shall be from contract award to February 29, 2024, with two one-year option periods.
* The contractor must have a minimum security level of reliability and deliverables up to Protected B.

**Contact Information**

* Contracting Authority: Michel Daoud
* E-mail: [suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca](mailto:suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 952-021
